articles.author: Lauren Dezenski, Madison Muller, Jennifer A Dlouhy
articles.title: Trump Plans 100% Duty on Patented Drugs in New Round of Tariffs - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: US President Donald Trump announced a fresh round of tariffs, including a 100% duty on branded or patented pharmaceuticals starting Oct. 1, unless a company is building a manufacturing plant in America.
